tidbits.title: Adriatic Coastline
tidbits.description: Montenegro boasts a stunning Adriatic coastline with picturesque beaches, medieval towns, and the iconic Bay of Kotor, a UNESCO site.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country offers diverse landscapes, from rugged mountains and glacial lakes to canyons, making it a paradise for nature enthusiasts.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Montenegro's cultural heritage is seen in its Orthodox monasteries, ancient ruins, and a blend of influences from the Balkans and the Mediterranean.
